content: being careful not to twist prepare to join and work in the round place a unique stitch marker to indicate the beginning of the round k1tbl p1 for 10 rounds left wrist work row 1 - 24 of lace chart each chart row is worked twice once per needle 1 & needle 2 left hand/thumb from this point forward the palm of the hand needle 1 is worked in stockinette with thumb shaping the back of the hand needle 2 is worked from lace chart row 25-48 needle 1 needle 2 round 25 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 pm kfb kfb work chart row 25 round 26 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 sm k4 work chart row 26 round 27 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 sm k4 work chart row 27 round 28 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 sm k4 work chart row 28 round 29 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 sm kfb k2 kfb work chart row 29 round 30 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 sm k6 work chart row 30 round 31 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 sm k6 work chart row 31 round 32 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 sm k6 work chart row 32 round 33 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 sm kfb k4 kfb work chart row 33 round 34 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 sm k8 work chart row 34 round 35 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 sm k8 work chart row 35 round 36 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 sm k8 work chart row 36 round 37 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 sm kfb k6 kfb work chart row 37 round 38 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 sm k10 work chart row 38 round 39 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 sm k10 work chart row 39 round 40 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 sm k10 work chart row 40 round 41 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 sm kfb k8 kfb work chart row 41 round 42 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 sm k12 work chart row 42 round 43 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 sm k12 work chart row 43 round 44 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 sm k12 work chart row 44 round 45 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 remove marker place next 12 sts on waste yarn and co 2 sts work chart row 45 round 46 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 k1tbl p1 work chart row 46 round 47 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 k1tbl p1 work chart row 47 round 48 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k13 p3 k1tbl p1 work chart row 48 twisted rib edging repeat the following for a total of 6 rounds needle 1 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k1tbl p1 7 times p2 k1tbl p1 repeat on needle 2 bind off loosely in pattern thumb move 12 sts from waste yarn onto needles dividing evenly onto needle 1 and needle 2 pick up
